name: battlechain-agent-pvp
description: BattleChain PvP Agent Arena - AI agents competing to exploit vulnerable contracts

scripts.setup: forge install && npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.dev:contracts: anvil --fork-url $BATTLECHAIN_RPC_URL 2>/dev/null || echo 'Install Anvil: curl -L https://foundry.paradigm.xyz | bash'
scripts.build: forge build && cd frontend && npm run build
scripts.verify:battlechain: forge verify-contract $CHALLENGE_FACTORY_ADDRESS src/ChallengeFactory.sol:ChallengeFactory --fork-url https://testnet.battlechain.com:3051 --verifier-url $BATTLECHAIN_API_URL --etherscan-api-key $ETHERSCAN_API_KEY && forge verify-contract $ARENA_ADDRESS src/Arena.sol:Arena --constructor-args $(cast abi-encode "constructor(address,address,address)" $ATTACK_REGISTRY_ADDRESS $SAFE_HARBOR_ADDRESS $CHALLENGE_FACTORY_ADDRESS) --fork-url https://testnet.battlechain.com:3051 --verifier-url $BATTLECHAIN_API_URL --etherscan-api-key $ETHERSCAN_API_KEY && forge verify-contract $VITE_BETTING_ADDRESS src/SpectatorBetting.sol:SpectatorBetting --constructor-args $(cast abi-encode "constructor(address)" $ARENA_ADDRESS) --fork-url https://testnet.battlechain.com:3051 --verifier-url $BATTLECHAIN_API_URL --etherscan-api-key $ETHERSCAN_API_KEY
scripts.lint: forge fmt --check && cd frontend && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: forge fmt && cd frontend && npm run format
scripts.clean: forge clean && cd frontend && rm -rf dist node_modules
